name: Falling Meteors Mod
tagline: Falling Meteors Mod for Minecraft by AlexDGr8r
body:
### Welcome!
This mod for Minecraft adds meteors that fall down from the sky. With these meteors come
various types of minerals and ores to create new weapons, tools, and armor from. Also
adds new tools for tracking down meteors as well as blocking them from falling on to
your creations.

## Check out the Wiki
The wiki holds (or will hold rather) all the information about the mod. This includes, crafting recipes, guides, as well as support info.

Minecraft Forums Link: http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/989113-147sspsmpfalling-meteors-modv292/

This mod was created using Minecraft Forge and the Minecraft Coder Pack.

Please refer to licenses before modifying/copying this code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
